municipal_registration.title: Municipal Registration
municipal_registration.description: Register with the local authorities for stays longer than 3 months
steps: Bring your passport/ID and proof of address

work_contract_validation.title: Validate Work Contract
work_contract_validation.description: Ensure you have a valid work contract issued by your employer
steps: Obtain a work contract from your employer
Review the contract to ensure it meets legal requirements
Submit the contract to the authorities if required

health_insurance_coverage.title: Obtain Health Insurance
health_insurance_coverage.description: Arrange health insurance coverage for the duration of your stay
steps: Check if your employer provides health insurance
If not, choose a health insurance provider (mutualiteit)

open_belgian_bank_account.title: Open Belgian Bank Account
open_belgian_bank_account.description: Obtain a bank account in Belgium to receive your wages

age_verification.title: Age Verification
age_verification.description: Confirm you are at least 25 years old to be eligible for seasonal work
steps: Verify your age meets the minimum requirement
Submit the age verification to the authorities
